alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 12:27AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota, including the following areas, in northwest Iowa, Clay, Dickinson, O`Brien and Osceola. In southwest Minnesota, Cottonwood, Jackson, Lincoln, Lyon, Murray and Nobles. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of rain, locally heavy, are expected through mid day Sunday. Some of this rain may fall over areas that have recently received substantial rainfall. This may result in potential flash flooding and rises on area streams and creeks.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Cottonwood; Jackson; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Nobles
